file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers: []
info:
  description: This is edi3 Resource Discovery API
  version: 1.0
  title: edi3 Resource Discovery API
  contact:
    email: info@edi3.org
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
tags:
  - name: info
    description: Information
paths:
  /info:
    get:
      tags:
        - info
      summary: provides base information
      operationId: getInfo
      description: |
        Get some base information about edi3 Resource Discovery API
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: searchString
          description: pass an optional search string for looking up information
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: base information matching criteria
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Information'
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
    patch:
      tags:
        - info
      summary: updates base information
      operationId: updateInfo
      description: |
        Update base information about edi3 Resource Discovery API
      responses:
        '200':
          description: information updated
        '400':
          description: 'invalid input, object invalid'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Information'
        description: Base information
components:
  schemas:
    Information:
      type: object
      required:
        - alias
        - title
        - version
        - releaseDate
      properties:
        alias:
          type: string
          example: edi3-discovery
        title:
          type: string
          example: edi3 Resource Discovery
        version:
          type: string
          example: 1.0

Error: unmarshal: json: cannot unmarshal number into Go struct field Info.info.version of type string
